languages.text: "Благодарю. В ваших словах я слышу предложение дружбы, но смиренно вынужден отклонить его. Но я по-прежнему считаю, что подвел вас. Можете рассчитывать на мою службу, но не смею претендовать на ваши откровенность и доверие".

"Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю. В ваших словах я слышу предложение дружбы, но смиренно вынужден отклонить его. Но я по-прежнему считаю, что подвел вас. Можете рассчитывать на мою службу, но не смею претендовать на ваши откровенность и доверие".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

"Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

"Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

languages.text: « Merci. Bien que je reconnaisse la main tendue de l'amitié dans vos propos, je dois humblement refuser. Je me sens toujours coupable de ne pas avoir été à la hauteur de vos attentes. Vous pouvez compter sur mon service, mais je n'ose pas aspirer à votre bonté ni à votre confiance. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

traits.locale_text: « Merci. Bien que je reconnaisse la main tendue de l'amitié dans vos propos, je dois humblement refuser. Je me sens toujours coupable de ne pas avoir été à la hauteur de vos attentes. Vous pouvez compter sur mon service, mais je n'ose pas aspirer à votre bonté ni à votre confiance. »

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます。あなたの言葉に友情の申し出を感じますが、謹んでお断りしなければなりません。私は今でも、あなたを裏切ったという思いを拭えません。忠実に仕えることはお約束します。ですが、あなたの率直さと信頼に応える資格が、私にあるとは到底思えません」
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます。あなたの言葉に友情の申し出を感じますが、謹んでお断りしなければなりません。私は今でも、あなたを裏切ったという思いを拭えません。忠実に仕えることはお約束します。ですが、あなたの率直さと信頼に応える資格が、私にあるとは到底思えません」

languages.text: «Gracias. Puedo oír la oferta de amistad que encierran sus palabras, pero debo rechazarla humildemente. Sigo sintiendo que le he fallado. Puede contar con mis servicios, pero no me atrevo a aspirar a su candidez y su confianza».
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias. Puedo oír la oferta de amistad que encierran sus palabras, pero debo rechazarla humildemente. Sigo sintiendo que le he fallado. Puede contar con mis servicios, pero no me atrevo a aspirar a su candidez y su confianza».

languages.text: “谢谢你，我从你的话语中听到了友谊的邀请，但我必须谦卑地拒绝，因为我还是感觉我辜负了你。你可以指望我继续为你效劳，但我不敢奢望你的坦诚与信任。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，我从你的话语中听到了友谊的邀请，但我必须谦卑地拒绝，因为我还是感觉我辜负了你。你可以指望我继续为你效劳，但我不敢奢望你的坦诚与信任。”

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim. Arkadaşça yaklaşımınızı takdir etsem de geri çevirmek zorundayım. Yine de sizi hayal kırıklığına uğrattığımı hissediyorum. Hizmetimden yana şüpheniz olmasın, gelgelelim samimiyet ve güveninize layık olabileceğime inanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkür ederim. Arkadaşça yaklaşımınızı takdir etsem de geri çevirmek zorundayım. Yine de sizi hayal kırıklığına uğrattığımı hissediyorum. Hizmetimden yana şüpheniz olmasın, ancak samimiyet ve güveninize layık olabileceğime inanmıyorum."

languages.text: "Danke. Ich höre das Angebot einer Freundschaft in Euren Worten, muss aber demütig ablehnen. Schließlich habe ich noch immer das Gefühl, Euch enttäuscht zu haben. Ihr könnt Euch auf mich verlassen, aber ich wage es nicht, nach Eurem Vertrauen zu streben."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. I hear the offer of friendship in your words, but I must humbly decline. I still feel that I have failed you, however. You may count on my service, but I dare not aspire to your candour and trust."

traits.locale_text: "Danke. Ich höre das Angebot einer Freundschaft in Euren Worten, muss aber demütig ablehnen. Schließlich habe ich noch immer das Gefühl, Euch enttäuscht zu haben. Ihr könnt Euch auf mich verlassen, aber ich wage es nicht, nach Eurem Vertrauen zu streben."
